original_text: Prepare to kill this king's children, because of the sins of their ancestors. Then his children will not rule the world. They will not build cities everywhere.’ Prepare to kill this king's children, because of the sins of their ancestors. Then his children will not rule the world. They will not build cities everywhere.’ Prepare to kill this king's children, because of the sins of their ancestors. Then his children will not rule the world. They will not build cities everywhere.’
korean_text: 너희는 그들의 조상들의 죄악으로 말미암아 그의 자손 도륙하기를 준비하여 그들이 일어나 땅을 차지하여 성읍들로 세상을 가득하게 하지 못하게 하라

sentences.original_text: Prepare to kill this king's children
sentences.korean_translation: 이 왕의 자녀들을 죽일 준비를 하라

sentences.original_text: because of the sins of their ancestors
Then his children will not rule the world
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그의 자녀들은 세상을 다스리지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will not build cities everywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 곳곳에 도시들을 건설하지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: Prepare to kill this king's children
